textAfterTable: *Daily Value not established. Other ingredients: 100% vegetarian capsule (cellulose, water). **FCCFIP is the newest addition to the fourth version of the Food Chemical Codex. The FCC is the only FDA approved way of measuring plant based enzymes. Recommended usage: Two capsules three times a day on an empty stomach (1 hour before or two hours after meal). More may be taken if needed. Contains no dairy, preservatives, salt, sucrose, soy, wheat, yeast, nuts, gluten, artificial colors or flavors.
